entrance.title: Entrance
entrance.description: The FlashBoss title screen. Press any key to continue to profile selection.

profile-select.title: Profile Selection
profile-select.description:
FlashBoss supports up to 5 user profiles. Each slot shows the user's avatar, name, and chosen master.

Empty slots display "Create New Hero" - selecting one begins character creation. Selecting an existing profile logs you in.

System options at the bottom: Backup Vault (6), Leaderboard & Links (7), About & Help (8), and Exit (9).

create-username.title: Create Username
create-username.description: Enter a username for your new hero. This name will appear on your profile and leaderboards.

create-avatar.title: Create Avatar
create-avatar.description: Choose an avatar to represent your hero. Pick from a variety of pixel art characters.

create-master.title: Choose Master
create-master.description: Select your guide: Luna, Claude, Odiin, Shen, Kitsune, or Aquila. Each master has their own personality and teaching style.

create-pack.title: Choose Language Pack
create-pack.description: Select your language pack. German Core and Esperanto are included. More packs available as DLC.

sanctum.title: The Sanctum
sanctum.description: Your home base. From here you can access daily practice, lessons, boss fights, the grimoire, and more.

vault.title: Backup Vault
vault.description: Manage your save backups. Create, restore, and delete backup files.

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard & Links
leaderboard.description: View leaderboards and access external links and resources.

about.title: About & Help
about.description: Credits, version info, and help resources. Links to tutorials and documentation.
